entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
